LanguageData.ICBMfission.label: ICBM
LanguageData.ICBMfission.description: An intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM) is a guided ballistic missile primarily designed for nuclear weapons delivery, this one is tipped with a fission warhead.
LanguageData.Sabot.label: Sabot
LanguageData.Fallout.label: Nuclear Fallout
LanguageData.Fallout.description: Nuclear fallout is the residual radioactive material propelled into the air by nuclear blasts or a nuclear reactor meltdown.
LanguageData.RimatomicsProbe.label: Rimatomics Probe
